entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone Harry glances at for assistance. She is described as smiling encouragingly in response to a change in Harry's tone.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is the house-elf who is tasked with finding Mundungus Fletcher and bringing him to Grimmauld Place. He is described as dropping his fists and looking up at Harry when asked to perform this task.

entities.name: mundungus fletcher
entities.description: Mundungus Fletcher is a person who needs to be found by Kreacher in order for the work of Master Regulus to be finished. He is mentioned as someone who has information about the locket.

entities.name: master regulus
entities.description: Master Regulus is a person whose work needs to be finished by Harry and his friends. He is mentioned as having placed a note in the locket for Voldemort.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's purse contains a fake Horcrux, which is used by Harry to trick Kreacher into bringing Mundungus Fletcher to Grimmauld Place.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the person who has been deceived by Master Regulus's note in the locket.

relationships.description: Kreacher is tasked with finding Mundungus Fletcher and bringing him to Grimmauld Place.
Harry uses a fake Horcrux to deceive Voldemort, who has been deceived by Master Regulus's note in the locket.
